sigma-seguros

In addition to these settings, there is a file _data/tokens-template.yml that you'll want to customize for your site. It's named 'tokens' because that was it's original purpose, but because tokens.yml is .gitexcluded, it's a good place to store your site-specific data that you'd rather not have forked or cloned. Of course, that means you'd want to back it up elsewhere.
